Description:
Ideal first home (Hunt Club)
If you're looking at expanding your investment portfolio or getting into the market for one of the most in demand areas in Melbourne, then you should definitely put this property on your list.
Features:
- 4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite
- Large open plan living area
- 2 car garage with internal access
- Plenty of backyard for the kids as well as a under roofline alfresco
- Large Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard & bench space
- Other features include, ducted heating, downlights, landscaped gardens, a fantastic street appeal & much more
The property is located within walking distance to the Hunt Club Wetlands, walking/bicycle paths, local parks, childcare, primary and secondary schools, public transport and the new Hunt Club shopping village.

Description:
Dream, Design & Build
DIRECTIONS
*Type into navigator 280 Narre Warren Cranbourne Road, Cranbourne East (This will take you to the entry of the estate)
*That street is Spirit Boulevard (please refer to image 2 for location of block)
Located in the highly sought after "East Estate", perfect to build a home to fit the entire family. Ideally located near all amenities you and your family would need such as Monash Freeway, Merinda Park Train Station, 24 hours GYM, Medical Centre's, Hunt Club Village Shopping, Springhill & Thompson Park Shopping Centers, Casey Fields Shopping Centre and much more…
*Titled Land
*480m2
*16m x 30m
Do you have children? Well the area has much to offer them too, in terms of schooling you are spoilt for choice. Great schools positioned only minutes' drive; such as Casey Grammar, Cranbourne East Primary School, Carlisle Park Primary School, Springhill Drive Early Learning & Kinder.
Close to many recreational and sporting facilities also; Casey Race, Cranbourne Racecourse, Casey Fields Tennis Courts and Carlisle Park which is a beautiful central feature with activities for all ages.

Description:
A stone’s throw away from it all!
This lovely 3 bedroom home would suit any first home buyer, investor or young family looking for a quiet home located close to all amenities. Currently including 2 study areas, which has the potential for 1 to be turned into an additional bedroom, a generous living area, a large kitchen and meals area, an ensuite in the main bedroom and a family bathroom with classic finishings. The outdoor area is perfect for entertaining loved ones at all times of the year. Located approx a 5 minute drive from Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and High Street and within walking distance from the Casey Stadium, Casey RACE aquatic and fitness centre, the Balla Balla Community Centre and the Cranbourne Library, this home is perfect for the those who love to be near it all!

Address: Lot 301 Camaro Drive Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
Brand New and No Progress Payments
Buy this brand new 4 Bedroom home with all the extras included and there's no progress payments either, what an awesome package which most other builders will not offer. The features are endless and include the following:
* NO progress payments, No repayments*
* Turn Key House and Land Packages
* Huge Stamp Duty Savings
* 2 YEAR RENT GURENTEED
* Walk to St Peters Prep-12 College and St Thomas College
* Walking distance to shops, parks!
-900mm Freestanding Omega Upright Stainless Steel Cooker
-900mm Freestanding Omega Range hood
-Omega Stainless Steel Dishwasher
-Caesar Stone Bench top to Kitchen.
-Porcelain Vanity Basins to ensuite and Bathroom
-Mirrors to ensuite and bathroom
-Modern Tap ware used throughout, Matt Silver Finish.
-Modern Lever Door Handles, Matt Silver Finish.
-Fully tiled shower bases
-Gas instantaneous hot water system
-Gas Ducted Heating
-Kitchen Overheads with bulkhead to ceiling.
-Choice of tiles or Laminate Floor Boards to Entry, Meals/Family Area, Kitchen and -Rear Passage. From Builders Range. Tiles to all wet areas.
-Coloured Concrete to driveway, path to front door and Alfresco Area.
-Landscaping to front and rear yards and fencing
-Fly screens to all opening windows
-Panel lift front garage door with remote control. Roller door to rear of garage where shown on plan.
-Recycled water connection to front and rear garden taps.
-New Fibre Optic communication setup through home with two phone points and two TV points.
With so many features and designs to choose from, The Bel Air Estate provides great location and convenience to schools, shops, public transport, and sporting facilities, whilst having outstanding street scape with quality built homes.
*Homes are yet to be constructed
*Photos for illustrational purposes only

Address: 20 Berwick Cranbourne Road Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
Live on the ARC
This home is conveniently located within close proximity to all amenities. A stone’s throw away from Casey Arc (Aquatic and Recreation Centre), a short walk to Cranbourne Library and minutes away from Chisholm Cranbourne and Casey Grammar School. Positioned perfectly near public transport, local schools and shopping centres, do not commit the mistake of missing out on an inspection for this property.
Property Features:
- Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe
- Spacious bedrooms with massive study/convertible 4th bedroom
- 2separate & decent size living zones with ample space for a large family
- Massive kitchen with lots of draws and cupboards for storage
- Massive pergola to keep you entertained regardless of the weather conditions
- Side Access with huge backyard to keep your boats/caravans/trailers etc
- Ducted heating and Evaporative Cooling
An excellent chance to get into the market. With a well-designed floor plan, this home will impress. To inspect this home please call us or we look forward to seeing you at the open home.
Photo ID required for all opens.

Description:
3 Living Areas! 660m2 Block! Rear Access!
You simply will not find a more complete & beautifully presented home in such a premium location. Finished faultlessly from front to back this home not only provides spacious accommodation, but if you want the PERFECT home to entertain family and friends - THIS IS IT!
The home features a spacious master suite with bay window, impressive custom fully fitted WIR and ensuite complete with oversize shower while the remaning 2 bedrooms are both nicely sized & also with fitted BIR's. The THREE living spaces include a stunning formal lounge upon entry, light filled rumpus room/theatre to the rear and large central open plan kitchen/dining & living area. The fully appointed kitchen has ample bench and storage space & even offers a servery out to the massive pergola complete with fans and speakers wired inside the roof ready for stylish entertaining all year round. The second outdoor living area is an expansive Merbau deck with room for lounging/dining and also a fully compliant 8 seater Endless Recharger spa... in addition to this there is still HEAPS of room for kids/pets to play on this 660m2 block... THIS REALLY IS THE LIFE!
Within close proximity to parkland, public transport, multiple Primary Schools, Cranbourne East Secondary, Casey Fields sporting facilites/Casey Race aquatic centre and a choice of shopping options - it's position perfect!
This home is move in ready with not a cent left to spend - so what are you waiting for?
Features:
Ducted vacuum
Foxtel throughout
Wired speakers to entertaining areas
Security system
Remote double garage with rear roller door access
Trailer parking bay to the rear of the block
Irrigation system to the front
2 outdoor entertaining zones
8 seater hot tub
900mm gas cook top
Provision for gas log fire in formal lounge
Ducted heating
Split system
Stainless steel dishwasher
Motorised block out blinds to 2 bedrooms
Part of the Telstra Smart Community
and so much more!
THIS IMMACULATE ENTERTAINER CAN NOW BE YOURS - BUT YOU BETTER BE QUICK!

Description:
LIVINGSTON ESTATE!!!
CRANBOURNE EAST - LIVINGSTON ESTATE: You can't help but feel at home once you step through this beautiful welcoming home built by Boutique Homes. Positioned in the popular Livingston Estate with neatly presented homes and across the road from a park, this home will suit any family, first home buyer or someone downsizing.
Offering a highly functional floor plan with a welcoming entrance leading you to the master bedroom with walk-in robe and full twin sink ensuite. The other 3 bedrooms have sliding robes.
The kitchen has a window splashback and offers stainless steel appliances - 900mm gas stove, electric oven, range hood, dishwasher and built in microwave. Caesar stone bench tops with an island bench overlooking the family/meals area. The kitchen has ample storage with overhead cupboards.
Outside you have a large grass area and an al fresco area for year round enjoyment. The blend of indoor outdoor living is the feature of this home with light and bright living areas.
Some of the extras of this home includes:
• Solar panels
• Colour bond fencing
• Ceasar stone in bathrooms
• Floating timber floorboards
• Built in microwave
• Ducted heating
• Evaporative cooling
• Window splashback
• Day night blinds
• Alarm System
• Low Maintenance Gardens
The location of this quality home is second to none with the park on your door step your family can enjoy the open space for many years to come.
Cranbourne East is located on the outskirts of Cranbourne Central. The area offers Cranbourne East Primary and Cranbourne East Secondary College as well as Cranbourne Secondary College and is surrounded by multiple Shopping Centres. Also located nearby is the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground, Casey Race Recreation & Aquatic Centre, and Casey Library.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.

Description:
Luxurious Living in Top Location !!
An Intricately designed ex-display house, interlaced with hard-wood flooring and tile within specific areas is one you would yearn to call home. With direct access to the recreational facilities at Casey Fields, this home is amidst one of the closest new communities to Cranbourne Town Centre. Moreover, ‘20 Eliburn Drive’ is within walking distance to a primary & secondary schools, kindergarten, health centers, sports precinct and many more public amities. Don't let this pristine lifestyle get away from you.
Featuring stuck stone and brick interlaced facade and a double garage with internal access as well as a grandiose yet easily maintained garden, adds to the home’s street appeal. With every detail carefully selected and quality crafted, the kitchen becomes a centerpiece of the house.
The island stone bench-top adds to the kitchens' modern and luxurious look, which consists of stainless-steel appliances. The overhead cupboard encased in a beautiful black gloss wrap adds that extra glamour, with the flashback adding that final touch.
Furthermore, the adjoining secondary kitchen gives every family the well needed extra space and equipment that comes in handy when moving into festive times or simply family parties.
The master bedroom includes its own en-suite and walking robe, with the two accompanying rooms consisting of their own built-in robes. Extra features include cooling and ducted heating, double
Enjoy gatherings in the generously-sized living/dining area, which flows seamlessly into the kitchen and well-landscaped backyard and more space for kids to play.
External features include double remote garage with internal access and Ducted Heating and cooling.
Please contact us to arrange a private inspection.

Situated in the sought after Hunt Club Estate in Cranbourne East, in a quiet location, and only a stone's throw from Cranbourne East schools and childcare, parks, wetlands, This amazing home with style and distinction at the forefront of design.

The outdoor also offers a massive fully enclosed indoor/outdoor room overlooking a fantastic size backyard with more than enough space for the kids to play.

Description:
A GRAND ENTERTAINER!
Located in the tightly held Cascades on Clyde estate sits this astonishing 4 bedrooms plus study delight!
Upon entry you will be immediately impressed by the quality on display, with a keen eye for detail this home will be sure to surprise even the pickiest of buyers. The huge master comes complete with walk in robes and full en suite with dual vanities!
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 900mm range hood, 5-burner gas cook top, tiled splash back, ample overhead storage and bench space. All of this overlooking your separate meals and rear living zone.
Not only is this home fitted out with top quality fixtures and fittings it also presents a grand capacity to accommodate even the largest of families, this is truly an entertainers delight with multiple living zones on offer!
Step through the sliding door and enjoy your massive back yard with a great sized alfresco, this provides the perfect setting to relax after the long wroking week or to simply entertain friends and family.
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands, this home boasts convenience. Other estate features include Class- A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks.
Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Minutes away from freeway access enroute to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just minutes away from Selanda rise and hunt Club village shopping centres.
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
TERRIFIC LOCATION IN CRANBOURNE EAST!
CRANBOURNE EAST: Situated in the highly sort after Cascades on Clyde estate, this exceptional family home sits on a huge 603m2 block and comes complete with all the extras and more!
This 4 bedroom delight comes complete with a generous sized master with walk in robes and full ensuite including dual vanities.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 600mm range hood and a 4-burner cook top. Not to mention the island bench with breakfast bar, ample cupboard/storage space and tiled splash back, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate oversized meals zone.
Those who like to entertain are bound to enjoy the multitude of separate living zones on offer. This home provides the perfect amount of space to accommodate families and guests of all sizes.
Added extras include: Internal access to your remote double lock up garage, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, down lights, low maintenance front and rear gardens, neutral tones throughout as well as a convenient blend of tiles and carpet throughout.
Step through the sliding doors out to your quality built large scale alfresco with an enormous rear yard; this will provide the perfect setting to entertain all year round!
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best!
Surrounded by top end properties the location is very appealing and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands. Other estate features include Class-A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks. Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne.
Minutes away from Freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Selandra Rise shopping centre and Hunt Club village!

Description:
SOLD BY BRANDON WHITTA!
Cranbourne East: Located in the highly sought after Cascades on Clyde estate sits this immaculate four bedroom home situated on a massive 612m2 block.
The master comes complete with a full ensuite and spacious walk in robe, followed by three generous sized separate bedrooms!
Walking through the hall way you'll notice the abundance of space on offer, with multiple living zones which include two separate living areas, separate dining and enclosed rumpus room, you'll be able to accommodate guests of all sizes.
The kitchen which overlooks the main living sector and outdoor entertaining area is finished with stainless steel appliances, tiled feature splash back, 900ml range hood with a five burner cook top, not to mention an abundance of bench and overhead storage space with plenty of room in the pantry.
Added extras include: neutral tones throughout, solar panels, ducted heating and tinted front and back windows.
If you love to entertain you will be sure to make good use of the generously sized, quality built pergola. Completely paved with low maintenance landscaping throughout the rear yard you'll never want to go back inside! It provides the perfect blend of grass and pavement so both adults and kids have a place to relax and enjoy!
Surrounded by picturesque wetlands and walk ways, estate features also include Class-A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities and playgrounds. Those who are business savvy will also appreciate the estates Telstra Velocity smart wiring.
Minutes away from Free-way access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Selandra rise shopping centre and hunt club village!
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best!

Description:
All you need is me
On a quiet, tree-lined street sits this gorgeous family home. Split over two spacious levels and boasting four separate living zones all in a prime location in Cranbourne East, this property is perfect for anyone looking for their first home, families needing more space or those simply wanting a lifestyle change.
First Floor features:
• Study / guest bedroom complete with double built-in robes
• Powder room for guests
• Well-appointed kitchen including dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, an over-sized double fridge space and plenty of cupboard space
• Large formal lounge, open kitchen / dining/ family zone in addition to a separate rumpus / second family area
• Sliding door access to the fantastic paved & covered alfresco to suit year round entertaining
Second Floor Features:
• A massive master suite complete with ensuite and walk in robe
• A further three great sized bedrooms which can easily home queen beds and all with double built in robes
• 2rd lounge / parent's retreat
• Generous family bathroom
Further Inclusions:
• Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
• Triple remote garage with rear roller door access
• Three water tanks totaling 10,000 litre capacity
• Low maintenance lawns & gardens with underground drainage system in the rear yard
And if all this wasn't enough – wait until you see the location! This home is position perfect being only a short drive to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Casey Race Sports Complex & Casey Fields as well as Primary & Secondary Schools, Chisholm Tafe, childcare centres and public transport. What more could you possibly need!

Description:
Now you see it, now you don’t
With most, if not all blocks sold this is the perfect and might be the last opportunity to purchase this block of land in the Livingston Estate.
- 448m2
- 14m frontage, 32m depth
- Titled, ready to build
- North facing
This highly sought after Livingston Estate is known for its family friendly parks, minutes’ walk to Casey Race, Library and closeness to shops such as Clyde Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Selandra Rise Shopping centre and more you would be spoilt for choice.
With public transportation close by and a short drive to schools such as Casey Grammar School, Coral Park Primary School, Lynbrook Primary School, St. Francis de Sales Primary School and the list goes on, you can rest assured knowing your children’s education is in great hands.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL OPPORTUNITY IN CRANBOURNE EAST!
CRANBOURNE EAST: Situated in the prestigious Cascades on Clyde estate, this exceptional family home is the complete package!
This 4 bedroom home comes complete with a generous sized master with walk in robes and full ensuite fitted with dual vanities and extended shower space.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 600mm range hood and a 4-burner cook top, tiled splash back, ample cupboard/storage options. Not to mention the abundance of pantry space on offer, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals and living zone.
Those who like to entertain are bound to enjoy the multitude of separate living zones on offer. There is enough space for the entire family to enjoy!
Added extras include: ducted heating & evaporative cooling, down lights throughout, rear roller door access, exposed aggregate driveway, good sized garden shed and neutral tones throughout.
Step through the sliding doors and be greeted by a massive 556m2(approx.) block with plenty of room for additional parking through the rear roller door!
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best! Surrounded by top end properties the location is very appealing and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands. Other estate features include Class-A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks. Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne.
Minutes away from Freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Selandra rise shopping centre and hunt club village!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Presented with pride this Porter Davis built home offers your family a smart floor plan and plenty of living spaces.

- 3 excellent living areas plus a separate study

- Fantastic covered alfresco for year round entertaining
- Beautifully landscaped & manicured gardens
Located close to shops, parks and schools it will not last on the market. Jump in quick or else you will miss your chance on this wonderful home.
